entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
